trans-unit.target: TEXT_LUCKZF007_03466_SEQ_00<tab><var 48 F201FC /var><var 49 F201FD /var> Quest Sync<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var> This unassuming townsviis seems to recognize you from somewhere.
TEXT_LUCKZF007_03466_TODO_00<tab>Speak with the unassuming townsviis.
TEXT_LUCKZF007_03466_TODO_01<tab>Follow the unassuming townsviis.
TEXT_LUCKZF007_03466_FRIENDLYVIIS03466_000_000<tab>You...it cannot be... Are you...!?
TEXT_LUCKZF007_03466_FRIENDLYVIIS03466_000_001<tab>Ah...oh, no. My apologies for the outburst. I confused you for someone I once knew. Something about you...seems so familiar.

TEXT_LUCKZF007_03466_FRIENDLYVIIS03466_000_002<tab>Perhaps you are a traveler as well? All who embark upon that path have a singular way about them. You must know much of the world outside the wood. Please, could you humor me with a story or two?
TEXT_LUCKZF007_03466_FRIENDLYVIIS03466_100_002<tab>Haha, a wise choice. You knew I would not stop at asking for two. Well, if ever you find yourself idle and eager to entertain, I shall be here.
TEXT_LUCKZF007_03466_FRIENDLYVIIS03466_110_002<tab>You agree!? Oh, many thanks to you. I am so starved for amusement these days.
TEXT_LUCKZF007_03466_FRIENDLYVIIS03466_000_003<tab>I heard tell that Lakeland had been abandoned. I once heard the name of the elves' new home in passing, but for the life of me I cannot recall it.
TEXT_LUCKZF007_03466_Q1_000_000<tab>What will you say?
TEXT_LUCKZF007_03466_A1_000_001<tab>You speak of the Crystarium.
TEXT_LUCKZF007_03466_A1_000_002<tab>Are you thinking of Eulmore?
TEXT_LUCKZF007_03466_FRIENDLYVIIS03466_000_004<tab>Yes, yes, the Crystarium. They say that the Crystal Exarch conjured the spire in an instant. Oh, to wield such power...
TEXT_LUCKZF007_03466_FRIENDLYVIIS03466_000_005<tab>Eulmore? Are you certain? No...the name had a different ring to it. It was almost...vibrant.
TEXT_LUCKZF007_03466_FRIENDLYVIIS03466_000_006<tab>What of Nabaath Areng? That city produced such lustering trinkets! Does it still stand?
TEXT_LUCKZF007_03466_Q2_000_000<tab>What will you say?
TEXT_LUCKZF007_03466_A2_000_001<tab>Only ruins remain.
TEXT_LUCKZF007_03466_A2_000_002<tab>It was consumed in the Flood.
TEXT_LUCKZF007_03466_FRIENDLYVIIS03466_000_007<tab>How dreadful! Truly, the Flood spared no land...
TEXT_LUCKZF007_03466_FRIENDLYVIIS03466_000_008<tab>Of course... The Flood brought ruin to even the grandest of cities...
TEXT_LUCKZF007_03466_FRIENDLYVIIS03466_000_009<tab>Tell me, have you heard of the Warriors of Light? Grand heroes, saviors of worlds, and so on.
TEXT_LUCKZF007_03466_Q3_000_000<tab>What will you say?
TEXT_LUCKZF007_03466_A3_000_001<tab>Not saviors. Destroyers.
TEXT_LUCKZF007_03466_A3_000_002<tab>Yes. They are heroes for us all.
TEXT_LUCKZF007_03466_A3_000_003<tab>Of course. I am a Warrior of Light.
TEXT_LUCKZF007_03466_FRIENDLYVIIS03466_000_010<tab>Is that so? I suppose you are right, given the state of things here.
TEXT_LUCKZF007_03466_FRIENDLYVIIS03466_000_011<tab>Indeed they are. I am glad to know there are some in this world who still believe in heroism.
TEXT_LUCKZF007_03466_FRIENDLYVIIS03466_000_012<tab>Hah, of course you are! I am full glad there are still those who admire their bravery. It warms my heart to see.
TEXT_LUCKZF007_03466_FRIENDLYVIIS03466_000_013<tab>I must thank you again for providing this old woman with company. Please, would you walk with me?

TEXT_LUCKZF007_03466_FRIENDLYVIIS03466_000_014<tab>Since you have been so kind, I would tell you a story of my own in return. However, it would not do if I were to be overheard. There is a place where we may speak in private, to the west. It will not take long.
TEXT_LUCKZF007_03466_FRIENDLYVIIS03466_000_019<tab>Thank you for coming. You may wonder why I brought you here.

TEXT_LUCKZF007_03466_FRIENDLYVIIS03466_000_020<tab>You see, long ago in these very woods, I was wounded, and nursed back to health by travelers much like yourself. They were hunting a very specific prey, and in exchange for my help they shared stories of the outside world.

TEXT_LUCKZF007_03466_FRIENDLYVIIS03466_000_021<tab>I remember very fondly that night, huddled by the fire, regaled by their wondrous tales. Although our time together was short, I know for certain there was naught but good in their hearts.
TEXT_LUCKZF007_03466_FRIENDLYVIIS03466_000_022<tab>When I heard that those selfsame travelers brought about the Flood, I refused to believe it.

TEXT_LUCKZF007_03466_FRIENDLYVIIS03466_000_023<tab>However, even if it is true, even if they caused this world's ruin... I cannot blame them. If they did somehow have a hand in it...it was not a willing one.
TEXT_LUCKZF007_03466_FRIENDLYVIIS03466_000_024<tab>You know as well as I, but we Viis can live well over two centuries. I myself have seen my hundredth nameday come and go.
TEXT_LUCKZF007_03466_FRIENDLYVIIS03466_000_025<tab>If the heavens deem it fit, we can live well over two centuries. I myself have seen my hundredth nameday come and go.
TEXT_LUCKZF007_03466_FRIENDLYVIIS03466_000_026<tab>Even so, too many of us have met premature ends at the hands of the sin eaters. There are not many left who remember the time before the Flood.

TEXT_LUCKZF007_03466_FRIENDLYVIIS03466_000_027<tab>That is why I was compelled to tell you of those travelers, so you might leave here with full knowledge of their character. Thank you for lending an ear to my story.
